item.title: Introduction
item.description: Install scripts generated by godownloader! This page contains scripts generated using godownloader.

item.title: Add your project
item.description: This will guide you on how to add your own project to this site. If you use GoReleaser, all you need to do is to add an empty YAML file to the GoDownloader tree folder, under the right path. For example, if your project lives under https://github.com/foo/bar, you may create the YAML file at tree/github.com/foo/bar.yaml. After that, you just need to open a pull request, and everything will happen magically.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This is the list of all projects being served in this site. You can see both the project path and the one-liner to install it here.
